text: Ingegerd Troedsson (5 June 1929 â€“ 3 November 2012) was a Swedish Moderate Party politician. She was the first female Speaker of the Riksdag from 1991 to 1994. She was the deputy Minister for Social Affairs from 1976 to 1978. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2012 deaths Category:Speakers of the Riksdag
